feedback.fit: The loose vest and leggings create a relaxed boho vibe, but the proportions could be improved for a more polished look.
feedback.color: The earthy green and brown tones work well together and suit the boho style.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals are a practical choice but don't elevate the outfit. Ankle boots could tie it together better.
feedback.accessories: Some layered necklaces and bangles would complete the free-spirited boho look.
feedback.style: Overall, it captures the boho aesthetic but needs refinement in the details and accessorizing.

feedback.fit: The belted trench coat creates a flattering silhouette, and the skinny jeans provide balance.
feedback.color: The rich burgundy contrasts nicely with the neutral gray and black for a put-together look.
feedback.footwear: The sleek knee-high boots elongate the legs and complement the outfit perfectly.
feedback.accessories: The outfit could be elevated with the addition of a stylish handbag and scarf.
feedback.style: Classic and chic, this look is timeless and sophisticated. Small tweaks could take it to the next level.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the button-down and shorts is perfect for a casual summer day.
feedback.color: The bright yellow contrasts beautifully with the black and white, making the outfit pop.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sneakers add a fun, sporty vibe that suits the overall casual style.
feedback.accessories: The outfit is accessorized simply with just a watch, allowing the clothes to shine.
feedback.style: Cute, casual and perfect for summer, this outfit nails effortless style. The graphic print adds interest.

feedback.fit: The fitted shirt tucked into short shorts creates a leggy look that is balanced by the looser shirt.
feedback.color: The light blue and black is a classic combo, but doesn't add much visual interest.
feedback.footwear: The chunky ankle boots ground the outfit and add an edgy vibe that works with the leather shorts.
feedback.accessories: The black handbag is a nice basic that doesn't compete with the outfit.
feedback.style: The leather shorts give casual basics an edgy twist. Bolder color or pattern could take it up a notch.

feedback.fit: The oversized sweater and coat create cozy layers, balanced by the short skirt for proportion.
feedback.color: The monochromatic pink and maroon palette is eye-catching and makes a bold statement.
feedback.footwear: The chunky platform sandals are an unexpected choice that adds a funky twist.
feedback.accessories: The floppy hat tops off the look perfectly and suits the quirky vibe.
feedback.style: Quirky and fashion-forward, this outfit combines girly and edgy pieces for a unique look.

feedback.fit: The fitted denim jacket and flowy dress create a nice juxtaposition of structured and feminine.
feedback.color: The light blue denim complements the white and pink floral print for a fresh, spring-like palette.
feedback.footwear: The ankle boots toughen up the sweet dress just a bit. Sandals could work for a different vibe.
feedback.accessories: The outfit could use some delicate jewelry, like a necklace or bracelet, to complete the look.
feedback.style: The mix of feminine florals with a casual denim jacket strikes the perfect balance for everyday style.

feedback.fit: The cropped leather jacket and mini skirt show some skin for an edgy, flirty look.
feedback.color: The black and white is punched up by the pop of hot pink in the skirt. The color blocking is striking and fun.
feedback.footwear: The studded flats add another edgy element that coordinates with the leather jacket.
feedback.accessories: The fringed bag is an eye-catching accessory that moves beautifully and suits the outfit's attitude.
feedback.style: Girly with an edge, this outfit combines sweet and tough elements for a head-turning style.

feedback.fit: The loose tee and cuffed shorts create a relaxed, boyish silhouette. More fitted pieces could flatter the figure better.
feedback.color: The navy, red and white is a classic combo but a bit expected. Introducing another color could add interest.
feedback.footwear: The sneakers are perfect for the tomboy aesthetic and keep the outfit casual and comfortable.
feedback.accessories: The tote is practical but plain. A unique bag could be a focal point to elevate the basic pieces.
feedback.style: The outfit has an effortless, borrowed-from-the-boys vibe but needs some tweaks to make it more fashionable.

feedback.fit: The fitted sleeveless top tucked into the belted full skirt creates an hourglass silhouette.
feedback.color: The hot pink skirt makes a statement, balanced by the neutral black and beige.
feedback.footwear: The T-strap flats have a vintage vibe that suits the retro style of the outfit.
feedback.accessories: The black belt defines the waist and pulls the look together. A hair accessory could be a nice addition.
feedback.style: With a nod to 50s style, this outfit has a retro feminine appeal. The bold skirt modernizes it.

feedback.fit: The fitted tank and flared skater skirt hug curves in all the right places for a flirty, pin-up inspired look.
feedback.color: The red, white and black is a classic pin-up color combo that always looks striking.
feedback.footwear: The T-strap heels continue the retro vibe and elongate the legs. Cute but could be less comfortable.
feedback.accessories: The thin belt accentuates the waist. Some retro sunnies or a neck scarf could amp up the pin-up style.
feedback.style: Playful and a bit sexy, this outfit has vintage va-va-voom that would turn heads at a party.
